author: Gutiérrez, Yoan and Castañeda, Yenier and González, Andy and Estrada, Rainel and Piug, Dennys D. and Abreu, Jose I. and Pérez, Roger and Fernández Orquín, Antonio and Montoyo, Andrés and Muñoz, Rafael and Camara, Franc
title: UMCC_DLSI: Reinforcing a Ranking Algorithm with Sense Frequencies and Multidimensional Semantic Resources to solve Multilingual Word Sense Disambiguation
booktitle: Second Joint Conference on Lexical and Computational Semantics (*SEM), Volume 2: Proceedings of the Seventh International Workshop on Semantic Evaluation (SemEval 2013)
